io.dropwizard.auth

Class AuthFilter.AuthFilterBuilder<C,P extends Principal,T extends AuthFilter<C,P>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dropwizard.auth.AuthFilter.AuthFilterBuilder<C,P,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the type of credentials that the filter accepts
    P - the type of the principal that the filter accepts
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicCredentialAuthFilter.Builder, OAuthCredentialAuthFilter.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    AuthFilter<C,P extends Principal>

    public abstract static class AuthFilter.AuthFilterBuilder<C,P extends Principal,T extends AuthFilter<C,P>>
extends Object
    Abstract builder for auth filters.
